snippet: Pablo Cuevas of Uruguay claimed his fourth ATP singles title with a 6-4, 6-7 (5), 6-4 victory over Guido Pella of Argentina in the final of the Rio Open on Sunday....
lead_paragraph: Pablo Cuevas of Uruguay claimed his fourth ATP singles title with a 6-4, 6-7 (5), 6-4 victory over Guido Pella of Argentina in the final of the Rio Open on Sunday.

headline.print_headline: Pablo Cuevas Takes Rio Open With Victory Over Guido Pella
headline.main: Pablo Cuevas Takes Rio Open With Victory Over Guido Pella
